data.title: Black Eyed Pig Barbeque
data.meta_description: Could it be our amazing mouth-watering ribs, juicy brisket or one-of-a-kind barbeque fried wings that keep folks coming back? YES! Black Eyed Pig BBQ is a barbeque experience you will never forget. Also enjoy our jalapeno corn muffins, tasty sides and amazing sandwiches. Come see us!
data.meta_site_name: Naples, FL BEST Barbeque Ribs, Wings & Brisket!
data.text:
We are pitmasters, as well as connoisseurs of FINE QUE. Step into our world and experience the best mouth-watering barbeque available.

The Pulled Pork is our House Specialty! Slow Smoked Boston Butts are smoked to fall off the bone to perfection and pulled by hand with no Sauce Added.

The Beef Brisket is a USDA Choice Meat and The St. Louis Ribs are Center Cut Spare Ribs that are 2.5 and Down on Weight for a leaner Cut.

Our Chilean imported Baby Back Ribs are always dry rubbed ONLY, and weigh in at a meaty 1.5 lb and down. YUM!

Here's what some customers are saying...

Customer service and product quality are our top priority. Although we strive to make every customer experience as easy as possible, it is how our customers rate us that really matters. Because it makes our customers happy! And we love making people happy.

Oh my gosh that was GOOD!

"BEP is the Nirvana of meat, and the Shangri-la of smoke. I can't wait to go back!"

Guy ClarkeVia Facebook

The wings are the BOMB!

"Service is great, sweet tea is great! Dry rubbed, smoked wings are SO AMAZING."

Suzanne H.www.yelp.com

Absolutely perfect!

"The brisket and pulled pork on point and highly recommended. Coming back!"

Brett Collinswww.yelp.com

Smoked wings were AMAZING

"The dry rub and smokey flavor were unlike anything I've ever had. Big Yum!"

Amandawww.yelp.com

Great portion sizes!

"Best BBQ in Naples, hands down!!! Great ribs and the cornbread is a nice side choice."

Becca F.www.yelp.com

A hidden gem in Naples!

"Pulled pork is juicy and delicious. Fried okra the best I've ever had. Very cozy too."

Janelle G.www.yelp.com
